overview:
Ken Lewis is a Certified Breema Bodywork Instructor, a mediation teacher, facilitator of Veet Mano’s Emotional Freedom, Osho Active Mediation leader, hatha yoga instructor, and Osho group facilitator.

Ken produced the Harmonious New Year’s Eve events in Chicago during 2003 and 2004, bringing consciousness, celebration, intimacy, and joy into the New Year’s eve experience. These well-attended events at the Holmes Place Health Club created a wave of smaller, community-center conscious events throughout Chicagoland.

Additionally, Ken has been active in hotel marketing, a skill-set he developed in the name of supporting his family’s hotel businesses. He operates a small, boutique firm called Organic Hotel Marketing. He takes on limited clients, as he prefers to be in the world of mediation and spirituality.

As of Fall 2010, Ken will be spending five years at the University of West Georgia, studying and researching Transpersonal Psychology, in pursuit of a doctoral degree and a career as a university professor. He will be maintaining his spiritual activities throughout this period, with a particular emphasis on helping to prepare people for meditation.
